name: Tetripix
description:
If you like puzzle games, or you need some time to kill, this is the game for you.
Enjoy attractive challenges to open hidden picture, earn gems to unlock the next level and beat your record.
Tetri Pix is not just a classic block puzzle but also consists of sudoku elements!
Just play it once and you won’t be able to put it aside.

Game Rules:

Match blocks to complete lines both vertically and horizontally or special sudoku squares(3x3) to get them destroyed.

Try to achieve combos by destroying several elements with just one move

Keep the board clean and you will open hidden picture and get gems!

Use gems to unlock another level for your own.
